statements.sql: select * from `users` where `id` = 56 limit 1

select `workspaces`.*, `user_workspaces`.`permission` from `workspaces` inner join `user_workspaces` on `workspaces`.`id` = `user_workspaces`.`workspace_id` where `workspaces`.`id` = 40 and `user_id` = 56 limit 1
select * from `stages` where `workspace_id` = 40 and `complete` = '1' limit 1
select count(*) as aggregate from `user_projects` inner join `projects` on `projects`.`id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` where `user_id` = 56 and `projects`.`workspace` = 40

select count(*) as aggregate from `user_projects` inner join `bug_reports` on `bug_reports`.`project_id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` inner join `projects` on `projects`.`id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` where `user_id` = 56 and `projects`.`workspace` = 40 and `bug_reports`.`assign_to` = 56

select count(*) as aggregate from `user_projects` inner join `tasks` on `tasks`.`project_id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` inner join `projects` on `projects`.`id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` where `user_id` = 56 and `projects`.`workspace` = 40 and find_in_set('56',tasks.assign_to)

select count(*) as aggregate from `user_projects` inner join `tasks` on `tasks`.`project_id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` inner join `projects` on `projects`.`id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` where `user_id` = 56 and `projects`.`workspace` = 40 and find_in_set('56',tasks.assign_to) and `tasks`.`status` = 156

select `tasks`.*, `stages`.`name` as `status`, `stages`.`complete` from `tasks` inner join `user_projects` on `tasks`.`project_id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` inner join `projects` on `projects`.`id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` inner join `stages` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`status` where `user_id` = 56 and `projects`.`workspace` = 40 and find_in_set('56',tasks.assign_to) order by `tasks`.`id` desc limit 5
select count(*) as aggregate from `user_workspaces` where `workspace_id` = 40

select count(projects.id) as count, projects.status from `user_projects` inner join `projects` on `projects`.`id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` where `user_id` = 56 and `projects`.`workspace` = 40 group by `projects`.`status`

select `stages`.`id`, count(tasks.id) as task_count from `stages` left join `tasks` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`project_id` where `stages`.`workspace_id` = 40 and date(`tasks`.`updated_at`) = '2024-03-04' group by `stages`.`id`

select `stages`.`id`, count(tasks.id) as task_count from `stages` left join `tasks` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`project_id` where `stages`.`workspace_id` = 40 and date(`tasks`.`updated_at`) = '2024-03-05' group by `stages`.`id`

select `stages`.`id`, count(tasks.id) as task_count from `stages` left join `tasks` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`project_id` where `stages`.`workspace_id` = 40 and date(`tasks`.`updated_at`) = '2024-03-06' group by `stages`.`id`

select `stages`.`id`, count(tasks.id) as task_count from `stages` left join `tasks` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`project_id` where `stages`.`workspace_id` = 40 and date(`tasks`.`updated_at`) = '2024-03-07' group by `stages`.`id`

select `stages`.`id`, count(tasks.id) as task_count from `stages` left join `tasks` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`project_id` where `stages`.`workspace_id` = 40 and date(`tasks`.`updated_at`) = '2024-03-08' group by `stages`.`id`

select `stages`.`id`, count(tasks.id) as task_count from `stages` left join `tasks` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`project_id` where `stages`.`workspace_id` = 40 and date(`tasks`.`updated_at`) = '2024-03-09' group by `stages`.`id`

select `stages`.`id`, count(tasks.id) as task_count from `stages` left join `tasks` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`project_id` where `stages`.`workspace_id` = 40 and date(`tasks`.`updated_at`) = '2024-03-10' group by `stages`.`id`
select * from `stages` where `workspace_id` = 40 order by `order` asc

select distinct `users`.`name`, `users`.`id` from `tasks` inner join `user_projects` on `tasks`.`project_id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` inner join `projects` on `projects`.`id` = `user_projects`.`project_id` inner join `stages` on `stages`.`id` = `tasks`.`status` inner join `users` on `users`.`id` = CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(tasks.assign_to, ',', 1) AS SIGNED) or `users`.`id` = CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(tasks.assign_to, ',', -2), ',', 1) AS SIGNED) or `users`.`id` = CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(tasks.assign_to, ',', -1), ',', 1) AS SIGNED) where `user_id` = 56 and `projects`.`workspace` = 40 order by `tasks`.`id` desc limit 5
select * from `workspaces` where `id` = 40 limit 1
select * from `workspaces` where `id` = 40 limit 1
select * from `users` where `users`.`id` = 54 and `users`.`id` is not null limit 1
select count(*) as aggregate from `ch_messages` where `to_id` = 56 and `seen` = 0
select `lang_fullname`, `lang_code` from `languages` where `lang_code` not in ('') or `lang_code` = 'en'

select `workspaces`.*, `user_workspaces`.`user_id` as `pivot_user_id`, `user_workspaces`.`workspace_id` as `pivot_workspace_id`, `user_workspaces`.`permission` as `pivot_permission` from `workspaces` inner join `user_workspaces` on `workspaces`.`id` = `user_workspaces`.`workspace_id` where `user_workspaces`.`user_id` = 56
select * from `user_workspaces` where (`user_id` = 56 and `workspace_id` = 40) limit 1

select `notifications`.* from `notifications` left join `projects` on `notifications`.`related_id` = `projects`.`id` and `notifications`.`type` = 'project_assign' left join `tasks` on `notifications`.`related_id` = `tasks`.`id` and `notifications`.`type` = 'task_assign' left join `bug_reports` on `notifications`.`related_id` = `bug_reports`.`id` and `notifications`.`type` = 'bug_assign' where `user_id` = 56 and `workspace_id` = 40 and `is_read` = 0 order by `notifications`.`id` desc
select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'taskly' and table_name = 'languages' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
select * from `languages` where `lang_code` = 'es' limit 1
